mapper.insert: insert into userInfo(id, pw, nickname) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: select * from userInfo where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
select u.nickname, u.point from userInfo u, rewardInfo r where u.point between r.minvalue and r.maxvalue and id = #{id}
mapper.update: update userInfo set point = point + 1 where id=#{id}
